main.description: Building scalable solutions with Ruby on Rails. Currently crafting great products at MeasureStudio.
main.bio: I'm a passionate software engineer with deep expertise in the Ruby ecosystem. At MeasureStudio, I build robust, scalable applications that make a real impact. My approach combines technical excellence with a genuine enthusiasm for solving complex problems. With years of remote work experience, I've mastered async communication and self-driven delivery while staying connected with distributed teams.
